#summary Roadmap

= Aims of this project =

 * browser-based addressbook & calendar
 * web frontend to gammu to synchronize with mobile devices
 * send contacts and dates via email
 * dial a contact's number on your phone via Bluetooth

=== maybe / maybe not / maybe later ===
 * maybe import contacts from websites
 * maybe import contacts from documents
 * maybe import contacts from an email account
 * maybe import contacts via emailing directly to django-gammu
 * maybe import contacts from a wiki
 * maybe implement [http://www.opensync.org/ OpenSync], the successor of MultiSync, see http://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/OpenSync
